title: Bad image Error status 0xc000012f
body: How do i fix this bad imgae error, i have already reinstalled the game once and it did not work. I have also used the hextech repair tool and that also did not work.

replies.body: It will not let me launch after the client update already installed it 2 times.

It sounds to me like that error might be pointing towards some game files that became corrupted. Repairing/reinstalling can help typically, but let's go over the steps in our [**Bug Splat Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974) to make sure we cover all of our bases!
